channel.title: Fructose on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Fructose on funPlantGenes

item.title: BrOG1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA08002322 Gene Symbol: BrOG1A Gene Name: Orphan gene 1 Genome: B.

item.title: BrOG1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraSca000221 Gene Symbol: BrOG1B Gene Name: Orphan gene 2 Genome: B.

item.title: CitSUS5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CitSUS5 Gene Name: sucrose synthase 5 Genome: Citrus Genome Database Species: Citrus reticulata Functional Descriptions: Expression analyses and functional characterizations of CitSUS5 and CitSWEET6 support their proposed role in regulating fructose and glucose levels, hexose to sucrose ratio, and sucrose synthase cleavage activity.

item.title: CitSWEET6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CitSWEET6 Gene Name: sugars will eventually be exported transporter 6 Genome: Citrus Genome Database Species: Citrus reticulata Functional Descriptions: Expression analyses and functional characterizations of CitSUS5 and CitSWEET6 support their proposed role in regulating fructose and glucose levels, hexose to sucrose ratio, and sucrose synthase cleavage activity.

item.title: CitZAT5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CitZAT5 Gene Name: ZINC FINGER OF ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA Genome: Citrus Genome Database Species: Citrus reticulata Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor CitZAT5 modifies sugar accumulation and hexose proportion in citrus fruit.

item.title: CmTST2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmTST2 Gene Name: tonoplast sugar transporter2 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of the tonoplast sugar transporter CmTST2 in melon fruit increases sugar accumulation.

item.title: CsSWEET17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSWEET17 Gene Name: Sugars Will Eventually be Exported Transporter 17 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsSWEET1a and CsSWEET17 Mediate Growth and Freezing Tolerance by Promoting Sugar Transport across the Plasma Membrane.

item.title: LeFRK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeFRK2 Gene Name: fructokinase2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: LeFRK2 is required for phloem and xylem differentiation and the transport of both sugar and water.

item.title: MdbHLH3-27
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD00G1130200 Gene Symbol: MdbHLH3-27 Gene Name: Malus domestica basic helix–loop–helix 3 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdCacyBP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD05G1283600 Gene Symbol: MdCacyBP Gene Name: Malus domestica calcyclin-binding protein Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdCBF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD07G1262900 Gene Symbol: MdCBF1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The MdCBF1/MdCBF2-MdTST1/MdTST2 module regulates sugar accumulation in response to low temperature in apple.

item.title: MdCBF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD01G1196100 Gene Symbol: MdCBF2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The MdCBF1/MdCBF2-MdTST1/MdTST2 module regulates sugar accumulation in response to low temperature in apple.

item.title: MdFRK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000323311 Gene Symbol: MdFRK2 Gene Name: fructokinase 2 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Increased activity of MdFRK2, a high-affinity fructokinase, leads to upregulation of sorbitol metabolism and downregulation of sucrose metabolism in apple leaves.

item.title: MdFRK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD04G1042400 Gene Symbol: MdFRK2 Gene Name: Malus domestica Fructokinase2 Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdHT2.2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD15G1193400/MDP0000154362 Gene Symbol: MdHT2.2 Gene Name: apple hexose transporter 2.

item.title: MdSDH2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000874667 Gene Symbol: MdSDH2 Gene Name: Malus domestica sorbitol dehydrogenase Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdTMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD06G1005100 Gene Symbol: MdTMT1 Gene Name: Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdTST1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD06G1005100 Gene Symbol: MdTST1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The MdCBF1/MdCBF2-MdTST1/MdTST2 module regulates sugar accumulation in response to low temperature in apple.

item.title: MdTST2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD10G1142100 Gene Symbol: MdTST2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The MdCBF1/MdCBF2-MdTST1/MdTST2 module regulates sugar accumulation in response to low temperature in apple.

item.title: OeMST2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: OeMST2 Gene Name: monosaccharide transporter 2 Genome: Species: Olea europaea Functional Descriptions: OeMST2 Encodes a Monosaccharide Transporter Expressed throughout Olive Fruit Maturation.

item.title: PagGS1;2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PagGS1;2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus alba × P.

item.title: PbCPK28
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr034839.1 Gene Symbol: PbCPK28 Gene Name: calcium-dependent protein kinase Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: Natural variations in the PbCPK28 promoter regulate sugar content through interaction with PbTST4 and PbVHA-A1 in pear.

item.title: PbrbZIP15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbrbZIP15 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: PbrbZIP15, was characterized from pear genome through the combined analyses of metabolite and transcriptome data followed by experimental validation.

item.title: SlARF10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc11g069500 Gene Symbol: SlARF10 Gene Name: auxin response factor 10 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlARF10, an auxin response factor, is involved in chlorophyll and sugar accumulation during tomato fruit development.

item.title: SlBL4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc08g065420 Gene Symbol: SlBL4 Gene Name: BEL1-LIKE HOMEODOMAIN4 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Found that down-regulation of a tomato bell-like homeodomain 4 (SlBL4) resulted in a slightly darker-green fruit phenotype and increased accumulation of starch, fructose, and glucose.

item.title: SWEET12c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc05g024260 Gene Symbol: SWEET12c Gene Name: Sugars Will Eventually be Exported Transporter Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Further analyses suggested that HY5 represses the accumulation of sugar in tomato fruit by activating Sugars Will Eventually be Exported Transporter (SWEET12c) expression.

item.title: VvSnRK1.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_00025806001 Gene Symbol: VvSnRK1.1 Gene Name: SNF1-related protein kinase catalytic subunit alpha KIN10 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: VvTOR interacts with VvSnRK1.

item.title: VvTOR
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvTOR Gene Name: serine/threonine-protein kinase TOR Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: VvTOR interacts with VvSnRK1.

item.title: ZmSTK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb374240 Gene Symbol: ZmSTK1 Gene Name: serine threonine kinase1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: ZmSTK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb192750 Gene Symbol: ZmSTK2|stk3 Gene Name: serine-threonine kinase3 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.
